mapper.select: SELECT sender , title , send_date , emp_id , mailbox_id , FIND_CODENAME(MAILBOX_ID) mailbox_name , mail_id FROM mail WHERE mailbox_id = #{mailboxId} ORDER BY mail_id DESC
SELECT mail_id , recipient , sender , title , content , send_date , emp_id , mailbox_id , FIND_CODENAME(MAILBOX_ID) mailbox_name FROM mail WHERE mail_id = #{mailId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail ( mail_id , sender , recipient , title , content , mailbox_id , emp_id ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(mail_id),0)+1 mail_id FROM mail) , #{sender} , #{recipient} , #{title} , #{content} , 'd2' , 100 )
